body:
### Welcome to the class.
This is the hub of all resources of the training class "MobileHybridApp". 
At the moment, the first class is being held at Arunsawad.com's office for in-house training.
And for the coming weeks, we are going to setup a place for us to bring the class to more audiences.
So stay connect with us, and be informed when the time is come.


### Tools set for Training:
Please visit this [Wiki Page](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-DevClass/wiki/Required-Tools) for detail instruction.

### Slide Presentation:
Sharing via Google Drive [here](https://docs.google.com/folder/d/0B-1TSqVLDnT6TnJORWh5VUcydzQ/edit).

### Lab files:
Day 1:
* [Lab 1 - HelloHybrid](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-HelloHybrid)
* [Lab 2 - Tartanator](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-Tartanator)  
* Solution is coming ..

Day 2:
* [Lab 3 - TartanatorPlus](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-TartanatorPlus)
* [Lab 4 - InSpaNote](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-InSpaNote)   

### Support or Contact
Check out the documentation at [Wiki Page](https://github.com/KengKode/MobileHybridApp-DevClass/wiki) or contact [KengKode](mailto:zarazi@kengkode.com) for more information and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

### )<eng )<ode now!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
